short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that routes all amazon URL's to smile.amazon, for the greater good!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is AmazonSmile ?

Its a variant of the amazon website that donates 0.5% of the price of your eligible AmazonSmile purchases to the charitable organisation of your choice.
AmazonSmile is the same Amazon you know. Same products, same prices, same service, more good.
